derivation: middle voice from G1223 (διατίθεμαι) and G5087 (διατίθεμαι);
strongs_def: to put apart, i.e. (figuratively) dispose (by assignment, compact, or bequest)
outline:
1. to arrange, dispose of, one's own affairs
    1. of something that belongs to one
    2. to dispose of by will, make a testament
  2. to make a covenant, enter into a covenant, with one
